original_text:
Of fine embroidered linen from Egypt
    was your sail,
    serving as your banner;
blue and purple from the coasts of Elishah
    was your awning.
korean_text: 애굽의 수 놓은 가는 베로 돛을 만들어 깃발을 삼았음이여 엘리사 섬의 청색 자색 베로 차일을 만들었도다

sentences.original_text: Of fine embroidered linen from Egypt was your sail,
sentences.korean_translation: 이집트의 아름다운 수놓은 아마포가 너의 돛이었고,

sentences.original_text: blue and purple from the coasts of Elishah was your awning.
sentences.korean_translation: 엘리사 해안에서 온 푸른색과 자주색이 너의 천막이었느니라.
